definition: to do well at/to do a good job
to do/to make/to go in for/to set up/to get hold of/to take care of
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: We all know we must study hard!
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道我們必須把學習搞好。

sentences.english: Forest park, beautify the national environment, for, make the tourism, have.
sentences.chinese: 森林公園，美化國家環境，對於，搞好旅遊事業，有。

sentences.english: To rectify the Party's style of work and improve social conduct, we should start with the senior cadres.
sentences.chinese: 爲了整頓黨風，搞好民風，先要從我們高級幹部整起。

sentences.english: Meanwhile we must do a good job in transport and communications.
sentences.chinese: 同時我們要搞好交通運輸工作。

sentences.english: The first lesson the soldier had to learn, therefore, was to cultivate good relations with the people.
sentences.chinese: 因此戰士必學的第一課就是搞好軍民關係。

sentences.english: They are working to get the autumn sowing done well.
sentences.chinese: 他們正努力搞好秋播工作。

sentences.english: It needs good relations with both if it is to prosper.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不斷髮展，伊拉克政府必須同雙方都搞好關係。

sentences.english: Also, "if your hygiene is bad, your health is probably bad," Griffen said.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的衛生沒搞好，你也可能不健康。

sentences.english: So we must do our best to study.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們必須盡最大努力搞好學習。

sentences.english: Organize constructors to enter the field and build infrastructures before construction according to the plan.
sentences.chinese: 按計劃組織施工人員進場，搞好臨建設施。

sentences.english: We will improve irrigated areas, build small water conservancy facilities and work hard to develop water-efficient irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 搞好小型農田水利建設，大力發展節水灌溉。

sentences.english: Thirdly, promoting systematic construction and realizing de-administration of office-management in universities.
sentences.chinese: 第三，搞好體制建設，實行辦公室管理去行政化。

sentences.english: Promise is the guarantee of well - provided reproductive health services.
sentences.chinese: 承諾是搞好社會服務的保證之一。

sentences.english: Do good client to molding department reception work and bear with propaganda work.
sentences.chinese: 搞好客戶來注塑部的接待工作和先容宣傳工作。

sentences.english: This article proposed that in order to do well in laboratory construction, its key is lader's idea and cognition.
sentences.chinese: 提出了搞好實驗室工作的關鍵是領導的理念和認識。

sentences.english: you really have to be able to relate to other people well.
sentences.chinese: 你真的必須能搞好人際關係。

definition: to enliven/to invigorate/to revitalize
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
an overall plan taking into account all factors
to straighten out/to sort out/to organize
to manage well
practical/workable/to implement/to carry out/to decide
arrogant/to put on airs/(business etc) to expand/to enlarge/to do sth on a big scale
to be in charge of/to concentrate on
to handle correctly
top priority job/matter of vital importance
to try harder/to redouble one's efforts
policy/guidelines/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be put in charge of/to be responsible for/branched passage
all sides/all aspects/multi-faceted
to attach importance to sth/to value
to determine/to resolve
